channel.title: Barrows on the Beta
channel.description: can somebody tell me a bit about how hard or easy barrows would be on the beta. And also would it be easy/possible to do it on an account that can only use magic for all of the brothers?

item.title: Barrows on the Beta
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Well yeah, the only flaw with that David is there’s already a ton of barrows items in the economy. Making it cheaper won’t decrease the number of items, unfortunately. It will probably go up a bit and change slowly, but it’s not going to change a lot, other than maybe stabilizing the armor.

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows on the Beta
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It’s going to be harder because of the nerfs to protection prayers.

However I think this is a good change, the armor is dirt cheap because it’s so easy, and yet it has higher stats than much more expensive items (and don’t try and say the fact it degrades makes up for it, because the cost is nothing)

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows on the Beta
item.dc:creator: @Anieli Anieli
item.description:
@Anieli wrote:

The Wanderer:

So I just can’t camp 10 trips there?

On my main I have got

Attack: 80
Strength: 96
Defence: 81
Hitpoints: 87

And if i knew what i was doing i might be able to manage 1 run there using torva, firecape, berserker etc…

So if you were maxed and had the best gear probably like 3 runs?

Read full topic

@Loveandpower wrote:

I’m not really sure sorry I could give more information. Most I had been able to do so far is three trips but I don’t have maxed stats either.

item.title: Barrows on the Beta
item.dc:creator: @Anieli Anieli
item.description:
@Anieli wrote:

Well no Mad Scientist outfit for me XD

EDIT: Somebody should try to cheat the challenge by doing the barrows up until the last chest on normal Runescape and then import their save to the beta? Perhaps then you can get the challenge easily that way?

item.title: Barrows on the Beta
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I used to do barrows all the time, as it was easily my favorite minigame. I could do 4-5 rounds without banking and use 1-2 prayer potions. I just did barrows on the beta and 5 prayer potions wasn’t even enough using better gear than I did before. The fact that Jagex has discouraged all forms of hybriding makes barrows exceedingly more difficult. You can’t change combat forms between the brothers without taking a lifepoints hit, so doing multiple trips on one inventory is going to take a new level of skill imo.

Read full topic
